> My question is this am I right in thinking that the
> Joi part of the 
> phrase Sonno Joi concerns revering the Emperor?


No, it's the other part ^^;;; 


"Son" -> revere
"Ou" -> king
"Jou" -> expel
"I" -> barbarians

Something like that ^^;;
